bike.description: Specialized TriCross A1 Premium aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, semi-compact Freeroad design, rack and fender fittings, integrated headset

components.description: Tricross FACT carbon fork, carbon legs, alloy crown and steerer, SpeedZertz inserts, rack and fender fittings
Cage bearings integrated HS. w/ 40mm of spacers w/ top cap
Specialized Elite-Set, 3D forged alloy, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Specialized CX Comp 6061 alloy, short drop
Specialized S-Wrap, cork ribbon w/ 2.5 gel pads
Shimano Tiagra STI, flight deck compatible
Silver cage/black body, w/ black toe clips and strap
Alex ACE-19, aluminum, sleeve joint, CNC machined sidewalls, w/ eyelets
Forged aluminum, 32h, sealed ball bearings, QR
Forged aluminum, 32h, double sealed ball bearings, cassette, QR
Body Geometry Rival road, w/ Cr-Mo rails
Chain stay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
